query_lineage.description: To answer questions about vulnerabilities like: What are the vulnerabilities of my product? What are the vulnerabilities of a specific component? What are the vulnerabilities of a specific version of a component? Which products have a specific vulnerability, or a vulnerability with a specificy characteristic (such as has_key)

query_lineage.instructions: Output ONLY the JSON object with no extra text

columns.description: list of columns to select. Use only these valid columns. Don't use extra columns, only the ones you need:
list of columns to select. Use only these valid columns. Don't use extra columns, only the ones you need:

filters.description: list of filter objects with keys

use.op: operator: ==, !=, >, <, >=, <=, in, not in, is null, is not null

groupby.description: list of valid column names to group the query by
